subject: Leadership
title: Why Ethics Matter in Leadership
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Why Ethics Matter in Leadership.

hook.text: Power without ethics is a weapon. Every leadership decision carries moral weight whether you see it or not.

buildup.text: Leaders shape culture. Their choices signal what's acceptable. One ethical shortcut can corrupt an entire organization.

discovery.text: Ciulla's argument: leadership without ethics is just power. True leadership requires doing right, not just doing well.

twist.text: Many leaders believe ethics is about big scandals. The real test comes in small daily choices nobody is watching.

climax.text: Ethics isn't a constraint on leadership. It's the foundation. Without it, influence becomes manipulation.

punchline.text: Character isn't tested in the spotlight. It's tested in the shadows.

quiz.question: When are a leader's ethics truly tested?
options: In small daily choices when nobody is watching
